module.name: Asterisk Info
module.description: Provides a snapshot of the current Asterisk configuration
module.changelog: *13.0.7.2* FREEPBX-18555 Improving and fix code about PJSIP. *13.0.7.1* FREEPBX-15253 Exception Asterisk is not connected *13.0.7* FREEPBX-12153 fix mobile view *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10254 Fix Queues html *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9757 asterisk info bad data *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9648 asterisk info has no version information *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9481 Asterisk Info error page *13.0.1alpha1* Complete reskin
